For sale is a t205 Christy Mathewson graded PSA 1. The card has a good image and color, but it also has a tear on the left border. I believe the card would have graded VG, if not for the tear. 

$SOLD. Payment via PayPal 'gift', or 3% extra for regular Paypal. PM me with questions or to purchase. Thanks............Matt
